content: Before booking, please make sure that the following apply to you: you are a holder of a passport issued by a foreign government ,and are entering Japan on a Temporary Visitor visa. Japanese nationals and foreign residents of Japan are not eligible for this ticket

Once your booking is confirmed, your QR code e-ticket and exchange order number will be sent to your email address. It is non-refundable and non-cancellable, and is valid for 3 months from the date of issue. You may request to change the validity period only once

Exchange your e-ticket for a physical one at any of the following locations: Kyoto Station, Shin-Osaka Station, Travel Service Center Shin-Osaka, Osaka Station, Tennoji Station, or Kansai-Airport Station
